api_host.title: Luzmo API Host URL
api_host.description: URL of the Luzmo API (e.g. 'https://api.luzmo.com', 'https://api.us.luzmo.com', or VPC-specific API url). Defaults to 'https://api.luzmo.com'.

api_key.title: Luzmo API Key
api_key.description: An API key generated in Luzmo's platform (can be generated here: https://app.luzmo.com/start/profile/integration).

api_token.title: Luzmo API Token
api_token.description: The corresponding API token generated in Luzmo's platform (can be generated here: https://app.luzmo.com/start/profile/integration).
